scripts.build: rm -rf dist && ng build && cp -r street-picker dist/
scripts.build-p: rm -rf dist && ng build --env=prod && cp -r street-picker dist/
scripts.build-sta: rm -rf dist && ng build --env=sta && cp -r street-picker dist/
scripts.build-pa: rm -rf dist && ng build --env=prod --aot && cp -r street-picker dist/
scripts.start: pm2 delete hf-pc & npm run build && pm2 start ./bin/www --name hf-pc
scripts.restart: npm run build &&  pm2 restart ./bin/www --name hf-pc
scripts.start-p: pm2 delete hf-pc & npm run build-p && export NODE_ENV=production &&  pm2 start ./bin/www --name hf-pc
scripts.start-sta: pm2 delete hf-pc & npm run build-sta && pm2 start ./bin/www --name hf-pc
scripts.restart-p: npm run build-p && export NODE_ENV=production &&  pm2 restart ./bin/www --name hf-pc
scripts.start-pa: pm2 delete hf-pc & npm run build-pa && export NODE_ENV=production && pm2 start ./bin/www --name hf-pc --watch -i 2
scripts.restart-pa: npm run build-pa && export NODE_ENV=production && pm2 restart ./bin/www --name hf-pc
